page.title: 10GOV'T:BADINGHAM/DENNINGTON
page.content: Both villages have Parish Councils. Both fall in the same District ward, County division & Parliamentary constituency. Conservative representation predominates. The penny rate product is Â£275 in Badingham & Â£280 in Dennington. Planning policy allows infilling only. Weekly rubbish collection, free collection of large domestic rubbish. The area is tidy.No main drainage. Septic tanks are usual (emptying cost Â£25) but a few earth closets remain. Mains electricity is universal. A few houses have no mains water - otherwise water supply is plentiful. Mobile library fortnightly. Roads are regularly swept, but maintenance is continuous owing to damage by heavy lorries. Fire service & police station at Framlingham.
